type: Tutorial Step - At the Core of Data Mining

definition.text: The core of a data mining operation are tasks running bots. One Task controls one bot, and a Task Manager may control multiple tasks.

paragraphs.text: Buy now you've learned about six different devices that you may use to control each bot in your data mining operation. At the highest level, the Data Tasks node controls all data mining bots in the Network Node.
We'll talk about network nodes in a minute...

At the lowest level, an individual task controls a single bot. The nodes in between are organizational nodes that help keep the operation orderly, and allow granular control over the different sections.
